ygData.subject: Re: Thanks and more questions...Equipment
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, I m wearing 2 electrum star ruby rings (+5 dex, +7 charisma), an Opaline earing, some crappy earing that I need to replace (+2 agility I think), neck is
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, I'm wearing 2 electrum star ruby rings (+5 dex,
+7 charisma), an Opaline earing, some crappy earing
that I need to replace (+2 agility I think), neck is
the thingie from the squire (AC 5 +7 to 2 resists),
back is cloak of the icebear.

If I were you I would upgrade the necklace to a runed
lava pendant. It's AC 5 +6 strength, and +3? fire
protection I think. It's mainly a strength piece. I
like charisma pieces pimarily but I always seem to get
encumbered so strength is the way I'd go. I would
also go with either the lizardscale cloak or cloak of
the icebear. Same AC and dex vs, resists.

Oh incidently, the pendent is droped by a 35th level
mob in Solusek A. I'm going to go camp him once I
make 47th.

Centiera D'Winter
45th Half-Elf Bard
Bristlebane

> Windleaf, Sylly, B,
>
> Thanks for your help on the quest. I am in SK now
> and plan just to run over
> to Queynos and take a trip to Erudin while I am not
> in Kunark. Also, thanks
> for sharing your kite areas. I am just starting to
> do OT and find it works
> pretty well there, too.
>
> So, my next question - just keeping the list active
> =). I have some
> Lambent(Helm, gauntlets and bracer) and plan to get
> the rest. Yeah, varied
> opinions on if it is the "best" armor for us, but I
> want to at least have
> the look for a while. My query is on options on my
> other armor - cloak,
> rings, earrings, neck, face, etc. I have a jagged
> band, a +7 Cha ring, a
> splintered bronze cloak, 2 oppoline Cha earrings and
> some + Cha necklace,
> Splitpaw maybe. I have been lucky in FM and have
> used pp from my two loops
> to purchase a MM drum (800) and currently have my
> remaining stash (1300ish)
> burning a hole in my pocket. I have most of the
> gems already for my
> Lambent, so I don't need to spend for them. My
> weapons are Obsidian Shard,
> Pugius, Dragoon Dirk in range slot and I use Gnoll
> Hide whips to keep up 1HS
> and use for stunning casters. Lately, I have been
> using the shard in my
> primary hand and the whip in my off hand - fun to
> burn and stun at the same
> time - that's when I use weapons at all as my melee
> does not compare(as we
> all know). I really want to upgrade my cloak and
> maybe my neck, but if you
> have other suggestions for my other slots, please
> share them with me(face
> WILL be the mask one day). Include your opinion of
> ball park value(I know
> it varies server to server) and where I could find
> it if I just traveled
> there(assuming I can camp there or maybe I can do it
> in my future) and any
> stats you can remember. Again, thanks in advance.
>
> Piemur Draggonsinger
> Wood Elf Bard of the 34 Songs
> Officer of Unity of Spirits
> The Nameless
>
>
>
________________________________________________________________________
>
________________________________________________________________________
>
> Message: 2
> Date: Wed, 27 Sep 2000 09:39:23 -0400
> From: "Cyr, Thierry" <thierry.cyr@...>
> Subject: RE: Tambourine Quest Details....
>
> i just got my tamborine last night and i must say im
> a happy camper, it gave
> me 2 pixels in level 40! that and i handed in 56
> drolvarg fangs at the same
> time, so i got 3 pixels for all of that stuff,
> needless to say i was happy
> the bloody captain was finally where he was supposed
> to be. I had a spare
> dalnir coin which i gave to another guy i was
> grouped with which hadnt
> started getting his coins, i think he will now...
>
> Minkin
> lev 40
> Sol Ro
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mott, Mike J.
> [mailto:mike.j.mott@...]
> Sent: September 26, 2000 10:57 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Tambourine Quest Details....
>
>
>
> Just for those of us on the list who dont know the
> details on the
> first two coins, mind filling us in?
>
> Thanks!
>
>
--------------------------------------------------------------
> > Hmmm... went by Allakhazam's and they have no info
> on the quest... how
> > odd.
> >
> > First thing's first, you must get a Star of Odus
> (buy it) from the jewelry
> > shop in Erudin. Turn it in to the *MALE* banker
> in FV. He will then give
> > you a 6-slot container with a combine button for
> the coins.
> > Since you already have the ones from Dalnir's and
> Kaesora, we'll skip
> > those.
> > City of Mist- One drops from the Captian of the
> Watch (or something like
> > that, I lost my detailed list :o/ )
> > Emerald Jungle- Must be Foraged for. Grab a
> nearby druid and exchange a
> > lil
> > mana for the foraging ;o)
> > Lake of Ill Omen- The Bloodgill gobbies in the
> lake (look at the base of
> > the
> > pillars around the center of the lake) carry
> these, and are probably the
> > toughest creatures you'll have to fight in this
> quest.
> > The Overthere- Check out the big pit in the
> center of the zone and kill a
> > scorpoid (can't remember the exact name, but it's
> the rarer of the two
> > kinds
> > of scorpions in the pit).
> > -all of these coins are fairly common drops-
> > Put them in the box the banker gave you, hit
> combine (now it looks like a
> > treasure chest), give it to him, and Voila! you
> have a Nostrolo's
> > Tamborine
> > (and you will notice the difference IMMEDIATELY).
> >
> > NOTE: Make *SURE* you have an empty spot in you
> general inventory for
> > when
> > he gives you the box for the gem (not sure about
> the tamborine, but always
> > a
> > good idea). If your inventory slots are full, you
> will get the "dropped
> > to
> > the ground message" but the box will be gone (ie:
> time to head back to
> > Erudin again).
> >
> >
> > Enjoy!
> >
> >
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter
> to lol@...
>
=== message truncated ===
